roleset.name: to describe or enumerate
roleset.note: RECOUNT-V NOTES: Member of Vncls say-37.7-1. (from recount.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: While [*-1] sipping a beer after practice , he vividly recounts [*-1]getting the Red Sox 's Carl Yastrzemski to pop out [*-2] to end the 1975 World Series , and repeating the feat against the Yankees ' Roy White in 1976 .
example.arg: While [*-1] sipping a beer after practice
[*-1] getting the Red Sox 's Carl Yastrzemski to pop out [*-2]to end the 1975 World Series , and repeating the feat against the Yankees ' Roy White in 1976

example.name: With Arg 2
example.text: His one other job during the past 18 months has been recounting his nightmare, over and over again, to border guards, embassy workers and aid agencies.
example.arg: His one other job during the past 18 months
to border guards, embassy workers and aid agencies
